body_html: I moved it to the export pass a long time ago, because this allowed us to keep the complete indexing (including advanced) supported in PyTorch as a single op. If you move this to Python symbolic, it's going to appear as 10 different variants that you will have to support.
body_text: I moved it to the export pass a long time ago, because this allowed us to keep the complete indexing (including advanced) supported in PyTorch as a single op. If you move this to Python symbolic, it's going to appear as 10 different variants that you will have to support.
body: I moved it to the export pass a long time ago, because this allowed us to keep the complete indexing (including advanced) supported in PyTorch as a single op. If you move this to Python symbolic, it's going to appear as 10 different variants that you will have to support.
